title: #28 - Lachlan on Quitting YouTube After Fortnite & DrDisrespect Twitch Ban Drama
itunes:title: #28 - Lachlan on Quitting YouTube After Fortnite & DrDisrespect Twitch Ban Drama
description: On this remote episode of The CouRage and Nadeshot Show presented by Cash App, Lachlan comes on the show to talk about Ninja and Shroud leaving Mixer, DrDisrespect's permanent ban from Twitch, playing with Lazarbeam & Muselk, and more!
